name: Great Naval Battles, Vol. 4: Burning Steel, 1939-1942
name_original: Great Naval Battles, Vol. 4: Burning Steel, 1939-1942
description:
Great Naval Battles, Vol. 4: Burning Steel, 1939-1942 is a strategy-simulation game developed by Divide by Zero. It came out on 01-01-1995. It was published by Strategic Simulations.
Great Naval Battles, Vol. 4: Burning Steel, 1939-1942 is available on PC.
